Frontend Developer Curriculum Vitae

Personal Information

Name

Ignacio Villanueva

Email

ignaciodenuevo@posteo.net

Web

http://localhost:4000

Twitter

https://twitter.com/ignaciodenuevo

Github

https://github.com/ignaciodenuevo

Skills

Frontend Skills

  • Focused on performance, responsive design, web typography and accessibility, JavaScript (React, Vue), Sass, HTML and frontend architecture.}

Strengths

  • Collaborative: predisposed to help teammates look beyond purely technical solutions.
  • Curious: constantly learning new topics to keep my knowledge current, with a particular interest in performance, responsive design, web typography, accessibility.
  • Engaged: working on side-projects, contributing to open source projects, speaking and organizing events helps me grow as developer and give back to the community.

Work Experience

Oct 2017 – present

Frontend at PlainConcepts (Barcelona)

  • Helped to improve Sass architectures using best practices leading the initiative.
  • Developed several SPAs using React and Vue to big clients.
  • Developed several applications using .NET technologies.

Dec 2016 – Oct 2017

Frontend at Kubide (Madrid)

  • Developed JavaScript-based UI solutions, websites and hybrid web apps.
  • Converted CSS into Sass using BEM methodology to help themaintainability of the code.
  • A client had a CSS codebase that had grown large and unmaintainable overtime. Using a Sass processor, I helped them refactor it, enforcing CSSbest practices. This reduced both it’s size and complexity, making iteasily adaptable and extensible by others.

Dec 2015 – Feb 2016

Frontend – Freelance (Remote)

  • Designed and developed a modern and intuitive UI for a sports socialnetwork hybrid web app, helping to test and validate a client’s minimumvalue product (MVP)

May 2015 – Nov 2015

Frontend at Martin & Young (Madrid)

  • Developed UI-based solutions for landing pages and websites using avariety of CMS.

Side Projects

Nov 2016 – present

Co-founder of FrontFest.es

frontfest.es

  • Founded one of the biggest conferences about frontend development in Spain.

May 2016 – Dec 2017

Frontend and Podcaster

wecodesignpodcast.com

  • Designed and developed a Jekyll-based static site promoting WeCodeSign.
  • Host and produce a weekly Podcast about frontend, UX and web design.

Nov 2016 – Oct 2017

Co-founder of Open Source Weekends

osweekends.com

  • Designed and developed a Jekyll-based static site promoting OSWeekends effectively and help our members know more about the activities we do outside our monthly event.

Oct 2016 – Mar 2017

Frontend and Open Source Contributor

  • Developed a landing page for a goods exchange platform delivering low-cost, open source solutions to non-profit organisations and people with no purchasing power.

Always Learning

Focused on performance, responsive design, web typography and accessibility.
